struct.name: Collision
struct.brief: Defines an interaction between two fort::myrmidon::Ant ponctual in fort::myrmidon::Time

field.name: IDs
field.brief: The fort::myrmidon::AntID of the two Ants interacting. note that the
field.doc: constraint `IDS.first < IDs.second` is always maintained to ensure uniqueness of IDs for fort::myrmidon::AntInteraction.

field.name: InteractionTypes
field.brief: Reports all virtual fort::myrmidon::AntShapeTypeID interacting between the two Ants.

type.name: std::vector<std::pair<unsigned int, unsigned int>, std::allocator<std::pair<unsigned int, unsigned int> > >

field.name: Zone
field.brief: Reports the Zone where the interaction happened, the
field.doc: corresponding fort::myrmidon::Space is reported in fort::myrmidon::CollisionFrame. 0 means the default zone.
